signature_matches.name: manipulate unmanaged memory in .NET
signature_matches.description: host-interaction/memory
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: manipulate unmanaged memory in .NET
    namespace: host-interaction/memory
    authors:
      - michael.hunhoff@mandiant.com
    scopes:
      static: function
      dynamic: unsupported  # requires class features
  features:
    - or:
      - class: System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal

signature_matches.name: link function at runtime on Windows
signature_matches.description: linking/runtime-linking
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: link function at runtime on Windows
    namespace: linking/runtime-linking
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
      - mehunhoff@google.com
    scopes:
      static: instruction
      dynamic: call
    att&ck:
      - Execution::Shared Modules [T1129]
    examples:
      - 9324D1A8AE37A36AE560C37448C9705A:0x404130
      - Practical Malware Analysis Lab 01-04.exe_:0x401350
  features:
    - and:
      - os: windows
      - or:
        - api: kernel32.GetProcAddress
        - api: ntdll.LdrGetProcedureAddress
        - api: ntdll.LdrGetProcedureAddressEx
        - api: ntdll.LdrGetProcedureAddressForCaller
        - api: MmGetSystemRoutineAddress

signature_matches.name: run PowerShell expression
signature_matches.description: load-code/powershell/
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: run PowerShell expression
    namespace: load-code/powershell/
    authors:
      - anamaria.martinezgom@mandiant.com
    scopes:
      static: function
      dynamic: span of calls
    att&ck:
      - Execution::Command and Scripting Interpreter::PowerShell [T1059.001]
    mbc:
      - Execution::Command and Scripting Interpreter [E1059]
    examples:
      - 692f7fd6d198e804d6af98eb9e390d61:0x6000004
  features:
    - and:
      - or:
        - string: / iex\(/i
        - string: / iex /i
        - string: /Invoke-Expression/i
        - api: System.Management.Automation.PowerShell::Create
        - api: System.Management.Automation.PowerShell::AddScript
        - api: System.Management.Automation.PowerShell::Invoke
      - optional:
        - substring: "powershell.exe "

signature_matches.name: allocate unmanaged memory in .NET
signature_matches.description: host-interaction/memory
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: allocate unmanaged memory in .NET
    namespace: host-interaction/memory
    authors:
      - michael.hunhoff@mandiant.com
    scopes:
      static: function
      dynamic: call
  features:
    - or:
      - api: System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal::AllocHGlobal

signature_matches.name: compiled to the .NET platform
signature_matches.description: runtime/dotnet
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: compiled to the .NET platform
    namespace: runtime/dotnet
    authors:
      - william.ballenthin@mandiant.com
    scopes:
      static: file
      dynamic: file
    examples:
      - b9f5bd514485fb06da39beff051b9fdc
  features:
    - or:
      - format: dotnet
      - import: mscoree._CorExeMain
      - import: mscoree._corexemain
      - import: mscoree._CorDllMain
      - import: mscoree._cordllmain

signature_matches.name: unmanaged call
signature_matches.description: runtime : managed code calls unmanaged (native) code, often seen in .NET
signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: unmanaged call
    namespace: runtime
    authors:
      - michael.hunhoff@mandiant.com
    description: managed code calls unmanaged (native) code, often seen in .NET
    scopes:
      static: function
      dynamic: unsupported
  features:
    - or:
      - characteristic: unmanaged call
      - match: unmanaged call via dynamic PInvoke in .NET
      - api: System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal::GetDelegateForFunctionPointer

signature_matches.name: stealth_network
signature_matches.description: Network activity detected but not expressed in monitor API logs

signature_matches.name: antidebug_setunhandledexceptionfilter
signature_matches.description: SetUnhandledExceptionFilter detected (possible anti-debug)

signature_matches.name: stealth_timeout
signature_matches.description: Possible date expiration check, exits too soon after checking local time

signature_matches.name: network_http
signature_matches.description: Performs some HTTP requests

signature_matches.name: static_pe_anomaly
signature_matches.description: Anomalous binary characteristics
match_data: {"anomaly": "Entrypoint of binary is located outside of any mapped sections"}

signature_matches.description: Sample execution stops while process was sleeping (likely an evasion)
PE file has an executable .text section and no other executable section
Reads software policies
PE file does not import any functions
match_data: No import functions for PE file found

signature_matches.description: PE file contains a COM descriptor data directory
Classification label
Disables application error messsages (SetErrorMode)
Sample tries to load a library which is not present or installed on the analysis machine, adding the library might reveal more behavior
Runs a DLL by calling functions
Spawns processes
PE file has a high image base, often used for DLLs
Contains modern PE file flags such as dynamic base (ASLR) or NX
Tries to load missing DLLs
Sample is a resource Dll without any import or exported function, cannot be analyzed
May sleep (evasive loops) to hinder dynamic analysis
Creates mutexes
Program does not show much activity (idle)
Creates a process in suspended mode (likely to inject code)
Contains medium sleeps (>= 30s)
Sigma detected: Unsigned DLL Loaded by RunDLL32/RegSvr32
PE file contains a debug data directory
.NET source code references suspicious native API functions

mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: link function at runtime on Windows
Adversaries may communicate using application layer protocols to avoid detection/network filtering by blending in with existing traffic.
.NET source code references suspicious native API functions
Runs a DLL by calling functions
May sleep (evasive loops) to hinder dynamic analysis

T1129.description: link function at runtime on Windows

T1071.description: Adversaries may communicate using application layer protocols to avoid detection/network filtering by blending in with existing traffic.

T1106.description: .NET source code references suspicious native API functions

T1218.011.description: Runs a DLL by calling functions
